title: Designing Sustainable Outdoor Living Spaces - Earth911.com
summary: A sustainable backyard can be created through building a sustainable deck with recycled materials. The integration of water features and native plants contributes to a healthy ecosystem. Eco-friendly design and conservation strategies, such as reducing water usage and using energy-efficient LED lighting, minimize environmental impact.

title: Nakuru: Dumpsite waste pickers creating wealth, jobs for low income earners - Kenya Broadcasting Corporation
summary: The Bondeni community in Nakuru, Kenya, is using discarded plastic bottles and used car tires to create new products, such as laundry baskets, flower vases, and building materials. They are also making briquettes from a blend of charcoal dust and cow dung to reduce reliance on firewood. These initiatives are helping to address the county's waste management challenges, promote a recycling culture, and improve the economic well-being of the community.
green_innovation: TRUE, the article describes several innovations that contribute to environmental sustainability goals, such as reducing waste, conserving natural resources, decreasing energy consumption, and limiting the release of harmful substances into the environment.
business_innovation: TRUE, the article describes several products and processes that are new or improved and differ significantly from the firm's previous products or processes, such as the use of recycled materials to create new products and the development of a new process for making briquettes from charcoal dust and cow dung.
green_product: TRUE, the article describes several products that are designed, manufactured, and used in a way that significantly reduces their environmental impact throughout their life cycle, such as the use of recycled materials, sustainable production processes that minimize energy consumption and waste, and product functionalities that support recycling and low environmental impact during usage and disposal.
green_process: TRUE, the article describes several processes that minimize environmental impacts and promote sustainability, such as the use of recycled materials, energy-efficient technologies, and methods for reducing waste and conserving natural resources.

title: Historic DOST Visit To MSU-IIT Signals A Bright Horizon For Scientific Advancement - Journal Online
summary: MSU-IIT welcomed a delegation of key officials from the Department of Science and Technology (DOST) to evaluate and champion projects that blend cutting-edge science with practical applications for society. The delegation visited the Center for Sustainable Polymers (CSP), the Center for Integrated Circuit and Devices Research (CIDR), and the Sustainable Resource Engineering Research on Construction and Technology (SuRER CT) Center, where they witnessed firsthand the university’s commitment to sustainability and innovation. The visit underscored the strong partnership between MSU-IIT and DOST in fostering innovations that resonate with societal needs.

title: News - Retail India News: Kanine Collaborates with Myntra, Unveils Global Pet Fashion Brands in India - Indian Retailer
summary: Juicy Chemistry and Mommy Shots by Amrita have teamed up for the 'Scars are Beautiful' campaign, which celebrates the beauty of postpartum bodies and stretch marks. The campaign features 11 mothers proudly displaying their bodies and sharing their motherhood experiences to inspire other women to embrace their bodies and change societal perceptions. The campaign aims to promote self-love and body positivity, and to redefine beauty beyond physical appearance.
